about_the_game:
Industrial Mayhem by CDE Trainz

Large Route with plenty for beginners to advanced Trainz players. Utilizing the latest technologies such as PBR textures and NVIDIA TurfFX effects, this route delivers. Compatible with TRS19, TRS22 and beyond.

Fictional route built in the rust belt of the United States. This map has hundreds of baseboards, miles of track, and thousands of assets with many industries that need products delivered and shipped. Passengers will need to get to their jobs. Challenge yourself with a dizzying number of logistical tasks. Included are 7 sessions with the package to give you hours of enjoyment.

* Unlocked Base Session
* Helicopter Tour
* Industry Tour
* Coal Run
* Fuel Run
* Passenger Run
* Hump Yard Sorting

Please note that the Coal Run, Hump Yard Sorting and the Base Session are intended for more advanded players. The Route and the unlocked Base Session have no rolling stock leaving you a blank canvas to 'play' with. The Base Session has the necessary Driver Commands loaded to operate the Hump Sort Yard.

Visit our website to get full documentation with a printable PDF map, lists of industries and other destinations.
detailed_description:
Industrial Mayhem by CDE Trainz

Large Route with plenty for beginners to advanced Trainz players. Utilizing the latest technologies such as PBR textures and NVIDIA TurfFX effects, this route delivers. Compatible with TRS19, TRS22 and beyond.

Fictional route built in the rust belt of the United States. This map has hundreds of baseboards, miles of track, and thousands of assets with many industries that need products delivered and shipped. Passengers will need to get to their jobs. Challenge yourself with a dizzying number of logistical tasks. Included are 7 sessions with the package to give you hours of enjoyment.

* Unlocked Base Session
* Helicopter Tour
* Industry Tour
* Coal Run
* Fuel Run
* Passenger Run
* Hump Yard Sorting

Please note that the Coal Run, Hump Yard Sorting and the Base Session are intended for more advanded players. The Route and the unlocked Base Session have no rolling stock leaving you a blank canvas to 'play' with. The Base Session has the necessary Driver Commands loaded to operate the Hump Sort Yard.

Visit our website to get full documentation with a printable PDF map, lists of industries and other destinations.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Industrial Mayhem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: A fictional route built in the rust belt of the United States. This map has hundreds of baseboards, miles of track, and thousands of assets with many industries that need products delivered and shipped, and passengers needing transport. Challenge yourself with the 7 sessions included in this DLC.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German
